last_episode_to_air.name: Love and Laughter
last_episode_to_air.overview: We enlist the help of the USO and the GI's of Comedy, in order to give one very patriotic family an unforgettable reunion, in the middle of an event honoring all the military families in Ft. Bliss, Texas.

name: Coming Home
overview: The unforgettable and inspiring surprise reunions of soldiers from all five branches of the military with their spouses, children, parents and other loved ones as they return home from active duty throughout the world.

episodes.name: A Knight's Tale
episodes.overview: A high school football phenom gets the surprise of his life when his soldier dad appears out of nowhere on National Signing Day. Two Army wives join forces to throw their kids a double daddy surprise. A Navy jokester pulls a hilarious homecoming prank on his own family. And a boy is reunited with his knight in shining armor, when his Army dad surprises him during a special show at Medieval Times.

episodes.name: Daddy's Little Girl
episodes.overview: We surprise a 12-year-old girl with the Navy father she hasn't seen in months at the violin concert of her dreams â€” and there isn't a dry eye in the house.

episodes.name: The Hat Trick
episodes.overview: An Army sergeant poses as an NHL goalie to surprise her husband at a hockey game; a soldier proposes to his girlfriend and invites her grandfather to perform the ceremony; a father surprises his daughter when she comes home from school; and an Army wife shocks her husband with her weight loss.

episodes.name: Paying Tribute
episodes.overview: The emotional journey of Marine Lt. Colonel Frank Latt, who travels to a small Alabama town to meet the parents and family of a fallen comrade, Airman Mark Forrester.

episodes.name: A Proper Wedding
episodes.overview: A sailor from the U.S.S. Harry S. Truman surprises his wife by returning home early and giving her the dream wedding she never had.

episodes.name: Finding Dad
episodes.overview: A soldier surprises his three kids with a treasure hunt all over their hometown of Clarksville, Tennessee. The prize at the end: their dad, home early from Afghanistan.

episodes.name: Holy Surprise
episodes.overview: A Baptist church-going family is surprised when their soldier father surprises them at a large Sunday service... in front of thousands of worshipers.

episodes.name: Motorcycle Parade
episodes.overview: A Harley-loving soldier surprises his four daughters by returning early from Afghanistan and leading a parade of 400 motorcycles right to their school's front door.

episodes.name: Birthday Roundup
episodes.overview: A soldier meets his son for the first time, twin girls get a birthday party with a very special present, new parents get a first glimpse at the newest addition to the family.

episodes.name: Short-Stack Surprise
episodes.overview: At a pancake breakfast to support the troops, two children get their soldier dad -- who they think is still in Afghanistan -- to help them make pancakes via an internet video chat. Little do they know, dad is actually in the next room and about to give them the surprise of their lives.

episodes.name: A Little Bit of Country
episodes.overview: Country Music star Clay Walker helps us surprise a wife with her husband, home early from Afghanistan, in front of thousands at one of his concerts.

episodes.name: Three Cheers for Dad
episodes.overview: A soldier returns early and works with his teenage children to surprise their mom in front of a packed gymnasium at the kid's school.

episodes.name: A Day at the Circus
episodes.overview: A fun-loving Marine dad goes undercover as a clown to surprise his kids at the circus -- to the cheers of a packed house.

episodes.name: Raider Reunion
episodes.overview: The NFL's Oakland Raiders help surprise the children of a lifelong Oakland Raiders fan who hasn't seen his family in over a year when he suits up in the infamous "Silver and Black" to make a stunning appearance mid-field during halftime at a game in front of a stadium full of Raider Nation fans.

episodes.name: Daddy's Girls
episodes.overview: The surprises just keep on coming, when a Navy Sailor comes home early from deployment, to surprise his wife and three girls with a series of unforgettable reunions.

episodes.name: Hula Homecoming
episodes.overview: Seven children who love to dance are surprised by their father during their performance at one of Hawaii's biggest Luaus.

episodes.name: Strike Up the Band
episodes.overview: A soldier surprises his son on his 13th birthday by posing as a percussionist with the University of Hawaii marching band in front of 40,000 fans, while another surprises his daughter during her karate lesson.

episodes.name: We'll Be Here for You
episodes.overview: With the help of two special guests from Sesame Street, an Army Father surprises his two kids with an early homecoming.

episodes.name: Slam Dunk
episodes.overview: Upon returning home from South Korea, a Military Father of two surprises his two kids at a University of Texas at El Paso basketball game halftime show by posing as the mascot.

episodes.name: Birthday Splash
episodes.overview: A Navy Sailor returns home early and gives his 11 year old son a birthday surprise at Sea World.

episodes.name: Photo Finish
episodes.overview: Some Army wives of Fort Bliss, TX conspire to surprise a fellow army wife and her baby girl when her husband returns home early from his first deployment.

episodes.name: Out of Thin Air
episodes.overview: An Army Specialist pulls off the ultimate magic trick, when he comes home early from Afghanistan and surprises his kids at one of the biggest shows in Las Vegas!

episodes.name: Daddy's Little Dancer
episodes.overview: An Army First Lieutenant stops at nothing to make it home in time to catch his little girl's dance recital, and reunite with his family for the first time in a year.

episodes.name: In Honor of Dad
episodes.overview: After a yearlong deployment, we help an Army Staff Sergeant pull off a giant, patriotic reunion with his kids, with the help of the US Army Field Band.

episodes.name: Love and Laughter
episodes.overview: We enlist the help of the USO and the GI's of Comedy, in order to give one very patriotic family an unforgettable reunion, in the middle of an event honoring all the military families in Ft. Bliss, Texas.
